mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AB_DOC ( ID, SEQ, IP, IMG_WID, IMG_HGT, SHAPES, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SEQ}, #{IP, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{WID}, #{HGT}, #{SHAPES, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, SEQ, IP, IMG_WID, IMG_HGT, IMG_SRC_SIZ, IMG_RSLT_SIZ, SHAPES, THUMB_WID, THUMB_HGT, THUMB_SRC_SIZ, REG_DT FROM AB_DOC WHERE ID=#{ID} ORDER BY SEQ
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM AB_DOC WHERE ID=#{ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
